title: Midterms = J6 Sequel? Our Dumbest Moral Panic Yet 10.26.22
itunes:title: Midterms = J6 Sequel? Our Dumbest Moral Panic Yet 10.26.22
description:
In episode 1359, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and co-host of Pod Yourself The Wire, Matt Lieb, to discuss… Trump Gonna Rehearse a 2024 Coup in Pennsylvania? America’s School And Q Based Moral Panic Is In Full Swing and more!

  1. Trump Gonna Rehearse a 2024 Coup in Pennsylvania?
  2. The Midterms Are Shaping Up as a Dry Run for Trump’s Next Coup
  3. America’s School And Q Based Moral Panic Is In Full Swing
  4. A teen’s mural included video game fan art. Parents called it satanic.

LISTEN: In Spring by Tara Clerkin Trio

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
